Packages
com.veriplace.client Provides primary Client interface to Veriplace Developer APIs.
com.veriplace.client.factory Provides factories for creating common objects.
com.veriplace.client.store Provides a mechanism for storing OAuth Request Tokens and Access Tokens.
com.veriplace.client.util Provides support for using the Client interface in a state-based application.
com.veriplace.web These classes simplify the process of using Veriplace user/location discovery within a servlet-based application.
com.veriplace.web.servlet These classes provide support for using com.veriplace.web within a simple J2EE Servlet application.
com.veriplace.web.spring These classes provide support for using com.veriplace.web within the Spring framework.
com.veriplace.web.views Veriplace can be configured to display "status views" to the end user under certain conditions.
